attributes.comment:
This proposed increase in fee will cause lot of hardship for the common man trying
to achive his dream of joining free society and land of opportunities, it like
imposing restricitons on people trying to achive the dream of joining a free
society .This is wrong on athe gatekeeprs to the free world to start saying if you
have money then only you can become a part of the great american dream.I think
raise should be not more than 10% of the exsisting fee.Even in corportate america
salaries for coomon man are increased in the order of 3-5% /PA,sometimes there
may not be any increase due to market conditions ,and sometime there may be
pay cuts also ,so USCIS should not increase the fees, they should increase it in
a phased manner may be this year they can try ti increase it to 10% and then
increase again in 2009,so every 2 years they can increase the fees to offset the
costs.

Thanks
Sreedhar
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Sreedhar Balerao
